itemDescriptionParagraphs: I will conduct a comprehensive initial evaluation over 75 minutes for adults and over two 60 minutes sessions for children/adolescents.

After our initial meeting, I might order labs and review other documentation, or speak to other people in your life or to schools. At the conclusion of the evaluation, I provide a comprehensive assessment and treatment plan recommendations.

We will establish a physician-patient relationship if we mutually agree that my practice is an appropriate place for your treatment. If this is not the case, I will provide you with an alternative referral.
A consultation is not a guarantee that I will be able to take the individual on as a patient.
